YouTube Shorts Auto-Play Chrome Extension
Enjoy YouTube Shorts Seamlessly!

This Chrome extension enhances your YouTube Shorts viewing experience. With this extension, you no longer need to manually click or wait for the next video to start. It automatically transitions to the next Shorts video, allowing you to enjoy continuous playback without interruptions.

Key Features
Auto-Play

Automatically plays the next Shorts video after the current one finishes.
Provides a smooth and uninterrupted viewing experience.
User-Friendly

Works immediately upon installation without additional setup.
Simple and intuitive, designed for everyone to use effortlessly.
Optimized Workflow

Eliminates the hassle of manually clicking or skipping to the next video.
Lets you explore content seamlessly without breaking your focus.
Ready to Use

Starts working right after installation and retains its settings even if you close the browser.

Enhanced Immersion

Watch your favorite Shorts videos continuously without interruptions.
